oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Courtyard of Al-Azhar Mosque
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lekegian, G.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Creswell, K. A. C. (Keppel Archibald Cameron), 1879-1974
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photographer's description: No.2112. MOSQUÉE El AZHAR (LA COUPOL & LES MINARETS VUE DE LA COUR). Translation of photographer's description: No. 2112. El Azhar Mosque (The Dome & The Minarets view from court). Collector's note: Minaret dates from Kait Bey (1468-96).
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mosques; Architecture, Fatimid
arcades; arches; courtyards; domes; minarets
oai_dc:dc.dc:date: ca. late 19th century or early 20th century
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: K.A.C. Creswell Photographs of Islamic Architecture
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: K.A.C. Creswell Oversized Photograph Albums; K.A.C. Creswell Photographs; K.A.C. Creswell Papers and Photograph Collection of Islamic Architecture; Rare Books and Special Collections Library; American University in Cairo
